items.title: EU's top diplomat rejects Russian claims of Ukrainian attack on government sites
items.title_zh: 欧盟最高外交官拒绝俄罗斯关于乌克兰袭击政府驻地的说法.
items.summary: The EU's top diplomat has called Moscow's claims that Ukraine targeted Russian government sites a "deliberate distraction" and an attempt to derail the peace process.
items.summary_zh: 欧盟最高外交官称莫斯科声称乌克兰以俄罗斯政府驻地为目标是"蓄意分心"并企图使和平进程出轨.

items.title: Bulgaria joins the euro after rocky path to new currency
items.title_zh: 保加利亚在进入新货币后加入欧元
items.summary: Bulgaria - the poorest country in the European Union - has become the 21st member of the eurozone - leapfrogging more obvious and prosperous candidates like Poland, the Czech Republic and Hungary.
items.summary_zh: 保加利亚是欧洲联盟中最贫穷的国家,已成为欧元区第21个成员国,它跃升了波兰、捷克共和国和匈牙利等更为明显和繁荣的候选国。

items.title: 北日本は2日にかけて 東日本と西日本は2日～3日 大雪のおそれ
items.title_zh: 北日本:2至3天
items.summary: 年明け 強い寒気と冬型気圧配置で大雪のおそれ 交通影響に注意
items.summary_zh: 在严寒和冬季气压布置中年终大雪

items.title: 400年余りの時を経て 旧薩摩藩主の島津家と西本願寺が交流へ
items.title_zh: 四百多年后 岛津家族的前佐佐佐马领主 和西弘安将交换
items.summary: 両陛下 東日本大震災15年 熊本地震10年のことし 被災地へ
items.summary_zh: 第十五回东日本大地震

items.title: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
items.title_zh: 图片:世界各地新年欢迎
items.summary: Nations around the world are welcoming the New Year as midnight strikes across different time zones.
items.summary_zh: 世界各国正在欢迎新年,这是跨越不同时区的午夜罢工。

items.title: 高市首相 首脳外交精力的に 中国との対立長期化避けられないか
items.title_zh: 高一总理在精神上必然与中国的长期对抗
items.summary: 両陛下 東日本大震災15年 熊本地震10年のことし 被災地へ
items.summary_zh: 第十五回东日本大地震

items.title: Fireworks, drums and light shows: How the world is welcoming 2026
items.title_zh: 烟花,鼓和光线显示: 世界是怎样欢迎2026
items.summary: Crowds around the world have gathered to welcome the new year.
items.summary_zh: 世界各地群众聚集一堂来迎接新年.

items.title: 東京 豊島区 トレカ販売店で強盗事件 男3人押し入りカード奪う
items.title_zh: 东京都岛库托雷卡销售商店 192 伯案 男性三人推入卡
items.summary: 両陛下 東日本大震災15年 熊本地震10年のことし 被災地へ
items.summary_zh: 第十五回东日本大地震

items.title: Israel to bar 37 aid groups as UK and EU warn of severe impact in Gaza
items.title_zh: 以色列禁止37个援助团体参加联合王国和欧盟关于加沙受严重影响的警告
items.summary: Israel is to revoke the licences of 37 international non-governmental organisations (INGOs) working in Gaza and the occupied West Bank, saying they failed to meet requirements under new registration rules.
items.summary_zh: 以色列将吊销在加沙和被占领西岸工作的37个国际非政府组织的执照,说它们不符合新的登记规则的要求。

items.title: Finnish police seize ship suspected of sabotaging undersea cable
items.title_zh: 芬兰警方扣押了涉嫌破坏海底电缆的船只
items.summary: Finnish police have detained a vessel sailing from Russia, which is suspected of damaging an undersea telecoms cable running from Helsinki to Estonia across the Gulf of Finland.
items.summary_zh: 芬兰警方扣押了一艘从俄罗斯起航的船只,该船涉嫌损坏从赫尔辛基到爱沙尼亚跨越芬兰湾的海底电信电缆。

items.title: Passenger describes 'chaos' after head-on Machu Picchu train collision
items.title_zh: 乘客描述在马丘比丘火车相撞之后的"Chaos"
items.summary: A passenger has described "chaos" after two trains collided head-on near Peru's most popular tourist attraction, Machu Picchu.
items.summary_zh: 一名乘客描述了在秘鲁最受欢迎的旅游景点马楚比丘附近两列列火车相撞后相撞后"chaos".

items.title: Watch: Stunning celestial events that lit up the skies in 2025
items.title_zh: 观察:2025年天空被照亮的 惊天动地事件
items.summary: From meteor showers to supermoons, many stunning celestial events have been captured on camera over the past year.
items.summary_zh: 从流星雨到超级月亮,过去一年中许多令人惊叹的天体事件被摄像头所捕获.

items.title: Sydney sends message of peace for New Year's after Bondi attack
items.title_zh: 悉尼在邦迪被袭击后 发来和平信息
items.summary: Sydney has welcomed the New Year with a message of peace following the Bondi Beach mass shooting, as huge crowds gathered to watch the city's annual fireworks display.
items.summary_zh: 悉尼以邦迪海滩大规模枪击后的和平信息欢迎了新年,因为大批人群聚集在一起观看了该市的年度烟花展.

items.title: 能登半島地震から2年 被災地の復興はまだ道半ば
items.title_zh: 野藤半岛地震发生后两年
items.summary: 両陛下 東日本大震災15年 熊本地震10年のことし 被災地へ
items.summary_zh: 第十五回东日本大地震

items.title: 両陛下 東日本大震災15年 熊本地震10年のことし 被災地へ
items.title_zh: 第十五回东日本大地震
items.summary: 悠仁さま 新年一般参賀に初参加へ
items.summary_zh: 尤尼参加新年总集会

items.title: NHK紅白歌合戦2025 出場歌手が熱唱 ステージ写真で振り返る
items.title_zh: 2025年NHK红白相声大赛
items.summary: NHK紅白歌合戦 ゲスト審査員7人決まる
items.summary_zh: NHK红白相声大赛7名嘉宾评委决定

items.title: Machu Picchu train crash leaves one dead and dozens injured
items.title_zh: 马丘比丘火车坠毁 造成一死一伤
items.summary: A train driver has died and at least 40 people have been injured in a head-on rail collision near Peru's most popular tourist attraction, Machu Picchu.
items.summary_zh: 在秘鲁最受欢迎的旅游景点马楚比丘附近,火车司机被撞倒,至少40人受伤.

items.title: Guinea junta chief wins presidential election by landslide
items.title_zh: 几内亚军政府首领通过滑坡赢得总统选举
items.summary: Guinea's junta chief Gen Mamady Doumbouya has won the presidential election by a landslide, getting 86.7% of the vote, according to provisional results published by the election commission.
items.summary_zh: 根据选举委员会公布的临时结果,几内亚军政府领导人Gen Mamady Doumbouya以滑坡赢得了总统选举,获得86.7%的选票。

items.title: Huge crowds mourn Bangladesh's first female PM at state funeral
items.title_zh: 大批民众在国葬上哀悼孟加拉首位女性首相,
items.summary: Hundreds of thousands of people travelled from across Bangladesh to the capital Dhaka on Wednesday to pay their final respects to former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia.
items.summary_zh: 数十万人星期三从孟加拉国各地前往首都达卡,向前总理卡莉达·齐亚表示最后的敬意.

items.title: Eurostar services return to normal after major Channel Tunnel disruption
items.title_zh: 欧洲之星服务在频道隧道中断后恢复正常
items.summary: Eurostar and Le Shuttle services between the UK and France have resumed through the Channel Tunnel after major travel disruption on Tuesday.
items.summary_zh: 联合王国和法国之间的Eurostar和Le Shuttle服务在星期二主要出行中断后恢复了通过海峡隧道的服务。

items.title: Heated Rivalry author says TV success led to help with her Parkinson's
items.title_zh: 加热的Rivalry作者说,电视的成功 帮助她的帕金森
items.summary: The author of Heated Rivalry has revealed the success of the TV adaptation has resulted in her receiving specialist help with her Parkinson's disease.
items.summary_zh: "Heated Rivalry"的作者透露了电视改编的成功导致她因帕金森病接受了专家帮助.

items.title: Mali and Burkina Faso impose travel ban on US citizens in tit-for-tat move
items.title_zh: 马里和布基那法索对美国公民实施禁行措施
items.summary: Mali and Burkina Faso say they will bar US citizens from entering their countries in response to a similar move by the Trump administration.
items.summary_zh: 马里和布基纳法索表示将禁止美国公民入境,

items.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, granddaughter of John F Kennedy, dies aged 35
items.title_zh: Tatiana Schlossberg,约翰·肯尼迪的孙女,35岁去世
items.summary: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of former US President John F Kennedy, has died aged 35.
items.summary_zh: 美国前总统约翰·肯尼迪的孙女塔蒂安娜·施洛斯贝格已经去世,享年35岁.

items.title: Jailed HK tycoon's 'teeth rotting and fingernails falling off', daughter tells BBC
items.title_zh: 被关进香港大亨的"牙齿腐烂和指甲掉下来",女儿告诉BBC
items.summary: The daughter of Jimmy Lai, the pro-democracy tycoon jailed in Hong Kong, has expressed concerns about her father's deteriorating health in prison, saying that his fingernails "sometimes fall off" and his teeth are rotting.
items.summary_zh: 香港被囚禁的亲民主大亨吉米·莱的女儿对父亲在狱中健康状况恶化表示担忧,称指甲"有时会掉下",牙齿会腐烂.

items.title: Diane Keaton, Pope Francis and Ozzy Osbourne... famous faces who left us in 2025
items.title_zh: Diane Keaton 教宗方济各和Ozzy Osbourne... 2025年离开我们的著名面孔
items.summary: The first non-European Pope in more than 1,000 years, the Oscar-winning star of Annie Hall and The Godfather, a soul legend and one of the world's most famous designers - here are some of the well-known faces no longer with us.
items.summary_zh: 1000多年以来第一位非欧洲教宗,安妮·霍尔和"教父"的奥斯卡得奖之星,灵魂传说和世界上最出名的设计师之一-这里已经有一些出名的面孔不再和我们在一起了.

items.title: Thailand releases 18 Cambodian soldiers held since July
items.title_zh: 泰国释放自7月以来被关押的18名柬埔寨士兵
items.summary: Thailand has released 18 Cambodian soldiers that were captured in July during deadly border clashes as part of a ceasefire the two countries agreed to on Saturday.
items.summary_zh: 泰国释放了7月份在致命边界冲突中被俘的18名柬埔寨士兵,这是星期六两国商定的停火的一部分。

items.title: Ex-Australia batter Martyn in coma with meningitis
items.title_zh: 前澳大利亚击球手马丁被脑膜炎昏迷
items.summary: Former Australia batter Damien Martyn has been placed into an induced coma after being diagnosed with meningitis.
items.summary_zh: 前澳大利亚击球手达米安·马蒂恩被诊断出患有脑膜炎后被置于被诱发的昏迷状态.

items.title: Trump says US hit 'big facility' linked to alleged Venezuelan drug boats
items.title_zh: 特朗普说,美国打击了"大设施" 与委内瑞拉毒船有关
items.summary: Donald Trump has said that the US carried out a strike on a "dock area" linked to alleged Venezuelan drug boats.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)表示,美国对一个与据称委内瑞拉毒船相联的"码头地区"进行了打击.

items.title: Watch: Underwater chess champions compete for world title
items.title_zh: 观察:水下围棋冠军争夺世界冠军.
items.summary: The Diving Chess World Championships has taken place in Groningen, Netherlands, with players using weighted pieces and magnetic boards.
items.summary_zh: 跳水国际象棋世界锦标赛在荷兰格罗宁根举行,玩家使用加权棋和磁板.

items.title: Brazil's Bolsonaro undergoes third medical procedure for hiccups
items.title_zh: 巴西的Bolsonaro接受第三次打嗝医疗
items.summary: Brazil's jailed former president, Jair Bolsonaro, has undergone a third medical procedure over four days to treat persistent hiccups.
items.summary_zh: 巴西前总统Jair Bolsonaro入狱,经过了4天的第三次医疗手术,治疗持续打嗝。

items.title: Saving South Africa's threatened albatross from lethal fishing lines
items.title_zh: 从致命的钓鱼线上拯救南非受到威胁的信天翁
items.summary: On a small boat in the Atlantic, about 27 nautical miles (50km) away from South Africa's Cape Point, a group of bird watchers are calling out seabird names: "Atlantic yellow-nosed! Black-browed albatross!"
items.summary_zh: 在大西洋的一艘小船上,距离南非"角点"约27海里(50公里)外,一群鸟类观察者呼唤出海鸟的名字:"大西洋黄鼻! 黑发信天翁!"

items.title: The 'thorny' issues that threaten to derail a Russia-Ukraine peace deal
items.title_zh: 可能破坏俄乌克兰和约的"大问题"
items.summary: Russia, the US and Ukraine agree that a deal on ending almost four years of full-scale war is edging closer but, in the words of President Donald Trump, "one or two very thorny, very tough issues" remain.
items.summary_zh: 俄国、美国和乌克兰都同意, 结束近四年全面战争的协议正在逐渐逼近,

items.title: Brigitte Bardot: From French cinema to international fame
items.title_zh: Brigitte Bardot:从法国电影院到国际名人
items.summary: Brigitte Bardot, the French model and actress, has died at the age of 91.
items.summary_zh: 法国模特和女演员布里吉特·巴多特逝世 享年91岁.
